Jeb Bush: s claim of cutting state spending more than anybody in the 2016 GOP field was supported by a tweet he made on Aug. 31, accompanied by a chart showing his supposed track record of fiscal conservatism.
Louisiana Gov: Bobby Jindal disputed Bush's claim and tweeted a different chart that contradicted Bush's assertion, showing that Bush was actually the top spender in the field.
The Bush campaign cited a Fox News fact: check as their source, which compared the track records of GOP governors in the race and concluded that Bush had cut spending the most.
The analysis of state spending used by F: general fund, federal funds, other state funds, and bonds. Critics argued that including funds provided by a third party, such as bonds, could skew the measurement of spending cuts.
